original_text: And Joab the son of Zeruiah, and the servants of David, went out, and met together by the pool of Gibeon: and they sat down, the one on the one side of the pool, and the other on the other side of the pool.
korean_text: 스루야의 아들 요압과 다윗의 신복들도 나와 기브온 못 가에서 그들을 만나 함께 앉으니 이는 못 이쪽이요 그는 못 저쪽이라

sentences.original_text: And Joab the son of Zeruiah
and met together by the pool of Gibeon
the one on the one side of the pool
and the other on the other side of the pool
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 한 사람은 못의 저쪽에 앉았습니다
